Package com.adamkoch.bowling.vos

Interface Frame

All Known Implementing Classes:
OneBallFrame, TwoBallFrame
public interface Frame
Frame represents the 1 or 2 ball turn in bowling.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calculateScore()
    Get the score of this frame.
    int
    calculateTotalPinsKnockedDown()
    Get the total number of pins one or both balls knocked down in this frame.
    Ball
    getFirstBall()
    Get the first ball in this frame.
    void
    setNextBall(Ball nextBall)
    Set the next ball after this frame.

  • Method Details

    • calculateTotalPinsKnockedDown

      int calculateTotalPinsKnockedDown()
      Get the total number of pins one or both balls knocked down in this frame.

      Note: Because this method doesn't simply return a value but can do calculations, I don't prefix it with "get".

      Returns:
      the number of pins that both bolls in total knocked down

    • calculateScore

      int calculateScore()
      Get the score of this frame. Used when tallying up the score at the end of the game.

      Note: Because this method doesn't simply return a value but can do calculations, I don't prefix it with "get".

      Returns:
      the number of points from this frame using future frames as needed

    • getFirstBall

      Ball getFirstBall()
      Get the first ball in this frame. Used to link with previous frames for scoring.
      Returns:
      first or only ball in the frame

    • setNextBall

      void setNextBall(Ball nextBall)
      Set the next ball after this frame. Used in scoring.
      Parameters:
      nextBall - the next ball bowled
